SYN_0_7_2571:
[Indication]
Symptomatic malignant pleural effusion, right side.
[Anesthesia]
Local infiltration with 1% Lidocaine (5 mL).
[Description]
Ultrasound survey of the right chest revealed a moderate anechoic effusion. Using the Seldinger technique, a 12Fr pigtail catheter was introduced at the 8th intercostal space, mid-scapular line. 450 mL of bloody fluid was drained. The device was secured.
[Plan]
Obtain CXR. Monitor output.
